author: jdillon
msg: Include the invalid uri in the exception text

author: bentmann
msg: [MPLUGIN-99] Do not document help goal twice

author: acumiskey
msg: In collapsed borders, the 'nonLeadingTrailing' case actually corresponds to the usual, 'normal' case, when no break occurs in the table. Renamed fields and parameters accordingly for readability and simplicity
Quick-fix to avoid creating unnecessarily large ArrayLists when adding inline ids to the page

author: trawick
msg: *) mod_cgid: Explicitly set permissions of the socket (ScriptSock) shared by
mod_cgid and request processing threads, for OS'es such as HPUX and AIX
that do not use umask for AF_UNIX socket permissions.
*) mod_cgid: Don't try to restart the daemon if it fails to initialize

author: bentmann
msg: [MPLUGIN-92] helpmojo resulting mojo requires a project and performs multiple times
o Omitted @aggregator from patch which is implied by @requiresProject=false
